ygData.msgSnippet: Perplex overheard and laughed. Perplex: Do you have something against Predacons? This is a Predacon designed ship, with a Predacon computer! Hahaha. Pertress:

Perplex overheard and laughed.

Perplex: Do you have something against Predacons? This is a Predacon
designed ship, with a Predacon computer! Hahaha.

Pertress: And I couldn't love this Maximal more.

Pertress spoke privately to Perplex. Perplex replied where only Pertress
could hear.

Perplex: Are you going to stay hidden forever? Maybe you could introduce
yourself. I'll introduce you. I've kept you a secret all off this time, but
i think that you need some more friends, Pertress, I want you to meet my
family! Please reconsider staying silent!

Pertress: Very well, just don't tell them about us.

Perplex: There is a certain Predacon right here in this ship, it's our
computer, named Pertress. Now you see? Predacons aren't all bad! Pertress
runs the CR Chambers and everything!

Pertress: It's nice to be a Predacon, even around a bunch of Maximals...

From: "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@...>

Sent: Wednesday, November 29, 2000 5:53 PM
Subject: Re: MeowMix

> "yOU A PREDACON???" sayd surpriced Windlord "are you kkiding kitty-

>
> Nighlight's circuits repaired 90%
>
>

> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Trinity::
> >
> > "Well, I'm a Predacon. I'm not that bad. But this one in my dream,
> he
> > was huge. And ugly. He was really big. He had a huge lizard head.
> Big
> > teeth that dripped drool all over as he walked. He had tiny little
> > forearms with sharp claws. He had two big legs that he walked on
> and
> > a long scaley tail.(She's describing T-Rex Megatron, but had never
> > seen him before.) And he had big red glowing eyes. But I got away
> > from him in my dream. I out ran him." she said smiling.
> >
> > "Aerotaur says that when things are right, we will find ArchAngle
> and
> > he'll fix me up. But I don't know how he'll fix me. I feel fine."
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > Zeni: Are the Predacons bad? I once had a friend who was a
> > Predacon, and he
> > > wasn't bad...
